mapper.select: SELECT * FROM (SELECT rownum rn, au.*, a.authority_name FROM academy_user au INNER JOIN authority a ON a.authority_code = au.authority_code WHERE a.authority_code = #{authority_code} AND rownum <= #{cri.pageNum} * #{cri.amount}) WHERE rn > (#{cri.pageNum} - 1) * #{cri.amount}
SELECT academy_user.*, to_char(academy_user.user_birth, 'yyyy-MM-dd') AS user_birth_enco FROM academy_user WHERE authority_code = #{authorityCode}
mapper.update: UPDATE academy_user SET user_name = #{userName}, user_tel = #{userTel}, user_birth = #{userBirth}, user_email = #{userEmail}, user_address = #{userAddress}, user_remark = #{userRemark}, user_image = #{userImage} WHERE user_id = #{userId}
